name: Transform Racing 2018: Car, Quad Bike & Airplane
name_original: Transform Racing 2018: Car, Quad Bike & Airplane
description:
This transform racing game is typical futuristic quad bike, Airplane and car racing game. Become a transform racer and join this transformation car and ATV quad bike transformation into airplane transformation. Join the sky high ramps for transform car driving to flying airplane simulation 2018. This futuristic racing games fusion is made for the lovers of transform race 2018. In Transform Racing 2018: Car, Quad Bike & Airplane you have impossible racing tracks with variety of sports cars, ATV motorcycle and big aeroplane. Various transform racing tracks from crazy hurdles and airplane flying with stunts, from city top bike ride to impossible race track of transformed car race it bring all in one transform race game.

Car transform into flying airplane or transform flying aircraft into motocross bike the fun never ends because you have choice your car transform into quad bike for racing stunts. Become a rider of motocross bike or a pilot of airplane or a race driver of sports racing car. The surprise will never ends with the transform race with futuristic racing games. In transform racing games just drive multiple transform vehicles by crossing transformation checkpoint into another type vehicle with teleport or time travel power. Providing multi transformation racing checkpoints to teleport from flying car to ATV ride.

Get all futuristic transform racing car, flying plane, ATV quad rider thrill in one mega ramp race with the taste of super thrilling adventure of multi transform race. If you love playing robot car transform or robot train transform game, then join this crazy mega ramp into off-roads, cross land air to airplane transformation race. Have you ever perform stunts in the air with multi sports vehicles? You have to download this transform race game and fulfill your dream. Extreme transform racing 2018 has many futuristic racing missions.

Features in Transform Racing 2018: Car, Quad Bike & Airplane

=> Fly airplane, ATV quad bike, motocross motorcycle & car.
=> All driving vehicles & riding bikes has transformation racing ability.
=> Intuitive controls & amazing 3D graphics in transform racing 3d.
=> Sky high impossible stunt race tracks & futuristic mega ramps for ultimate racing.
=> Extreme driving & racing challenges with fly airplane transform challenge.
=> Transform parking missions, park airplane or car in transformation parking style.
=> Use driving or airplane pilot skills to complete the level of transform race.

Choice is yours in this futuristic transformation stunt racer simulation game whether you choose a transform ATV rider to flying airplane pilot or drive sports car with mega ramp transformation checkpoint. You can ride your transform motorcycle or fast motocross bike if you want to be a rider. Download Transform Racing 2018: Car, Quad Bike & Airplane and become a skilled transform car driver or quad bike rider with airplane flying.
